verses.verse: And God<WH430> spake<WH1696> all these words<WH1697>, saying<WH559>,
I am Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, who brought<WH3318> thee out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
Thou shalt have no other<WH312> gods<WH430> before me<WH6440>.

Thou shalt not make<WH6213> unto thee a graven image<WH6459>, nor any likeness<WH8544> of any thing that<WH834> is in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, or that is in the earth<WH776> beneath<WH4325>, or that is in the water under the earth<WH776>:

thou shalt not bow down<WH7812> thyself unto them<WH5647>, nor serve them<WH3068>; for I Jehovah thy God<WH430> am a jealous<WH7067> God<WH430>, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> upon the children<WH1121>, upon the third<WH8029> and upon the fourth<WH7256> generation of them that hate me<WH8130>,
and showing<WH6213> lovingkindness<WH2617> unto thousands<WH505> of them that love<WH157> me and keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687>.

Thou shalt not take<WH5375> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in vain<WH7723>; for Jehovah<WH3068> will not hold him guiltless<WH5352> that taketh<WH5375> his name<WH8034> in vain<WH7723>.
Remember <WH2142> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, to keep it holy<WH6942>.
Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> shalt thou labor<WH5647>, and do<WH6213> all thy work<WH4399>;

but the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is a sabbath<WH7676> unto Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: in it thou shalt not do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>, thou<WH1121>, nor thy son, nor thy daughter<WH1323>, thy man-servant<WH5650>, nor thy maid-servant<WH519>, nor thy cattle<WH929>, nor thy stranger<WH1616> that is within thy gates<WH8179>:

for in six<WH8337> days<WH3117> Jehovah<WH3068> made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>, the sea<WH3220>, and all that in them is<WH5117>, and rested the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117>: wherefore Jehovah<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, and hallowed it<WH6942>.
Honor <WH3513> thy father<WH1> and thy mother<WH517>, that thy days<WH3117> may be long<WH748> in the land<WH127> which Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth thee<WH5414>.
Thou shalt not kill<WH7523>.
Thou shalt not commit adultery<WH5003>.
Thou shalt not steal<WH1589>.
Thou shalt not bear<WH6030> false<WH8267> witness<WH5707> against thy neighbor<WH7453>.

Thou shalt not covet<WH2530> thy neighbor<WH7453>'s house<WH1004>, thou shalt not covet<WH2530> thy neighbor<WH7453>'s wife<WH802>, nor his man-servant<WH5650>, nor his maid-servant<WH519>, nor his ox<WH7794>, nor his ass<WH2543>, nor anything that is thy neighbor<WH7453>'s.

And all the people<WH5971> perceived<WH7200> the thunderings<WH6963>, and the lightnings<WH3940>, and the voice<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, and the mountain<WH2022> smoking<WH6226>: and when the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it<WH5128>, they trembled, and stood<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>.
And they said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Speak<WH1696> thou with us<WH8085>, and we will hear; but let not God<WH430> speak<WH1696> with us<WH4191>, lest we die.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, Fear<WH3372> not<WH430>: for God is come<WH935> to<WH5668> prove<WH5254> you<WH3374>, and that his fear may be before you<WH6440>, that ye sin not<WH2398>.
And the people<WH5971> stood<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>, and Moses<WH4872> drew near<WH5066> unto the thick darkness<WH6205> where God was<WH430>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Thus thou shalt say<WH559> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, Ye yourselves have seen<WH7200> that I have talked<WH1696> with you from heaven<WH8064>.
Ye shall not make<WH6213> other gods<WH430> with me<WH3701>; gods of silver, or gods<WH430> of gold<WH2091>, ye shall not make unto you<WH6213>.

An altar<WH4196> of earth<WH127> thou shalt make<WH6213> unto me<WH2076>, and shalt sacrifice thereon thy burnt-offerings<WH5930>, and thy peace-offerings<WH8002>, thy sheep<WH6629>, and thine oxen<WH1241>: in every place<WH4725> where I record<WH2142> my name<WH8034> I will come<WH935> unto thee and I will bless thee<WH1288>.

And if thou make<WH6213> me an altar<WH4196> of stone<WH68>, thou shalt not build<WH1129> it of hewn stones<WH1496>; for if thou lift up<WH5130> thy tool<WH2719> upon it<WH2490>, thou hast polluted it.
Neither shalt thou go up<WH5927> by steps<WH4609> unto mine altar<WH4196>, that thy nakedness<WH6172> be not uncovered thereon<WH1540>.
